content: whether you are looking for a cute winter decoration or a fun indoor snowball fight these snowballs are quick and easy to make they are super soft and squishy so you can throw them without hurting anyone or anything and as a bonus you don t get the cold and wet that comes along with real snow or you can put a bunch in a bucket for a cute decoration that lasts all winter or use them in place of beanbags in a party game for a winter or christmas party you will need blanket yarn in white and a k 6 5mm crochet hook as well as some stuffing to make these snowballs one ball of blanket yarn will make several snowballs
